1455167452363386886.name: Science & Nature
1455167452363386886.tweet: A Sleeping Octopus Changes Color While Dreaming 🐙  Octopuses usually change their skin color for camouflage, but during sleep, env factors no longer trigger these patterns. The researchers inferred that the color changes during sleep results from independent brain activity.  https://t.co/RUWpbfh44H
